Started playing CS in the original beta2. Played all versions off and on for years. Quit playing CS:GO in 2016 because of hacks. Installed again in 2020... Played one game. Three people were kicked for hacking. Uninstalled immediately...

Cara, um dos melhores jogos para passar o tempo, antes a comunidade era bem menos tóxica, estou voltando a jogar, pois é aquele tipo de jogo que você joga por muito tempo, para por um, depois volta novamente e com coisas diferentes, as atualizações fazem muita diferença, melhoraria bastante se a comunidade não estivesse tão tóxica e soubesse se divertir como nos velhos tempos.
Fun game. Very toxic community but also a funny, sometimes friendly community as well. Definitely have had a lot of fun moments in this game. 8/10 would recommend.

Invest a little time to get used to aiming in Deathmatch and you will have more fun playing Casual.  Valve needs to do more to detect the frankly obvious cheats in Casual though, instant aimlocks, spinbots, speed hacks, and that youtube guy who never plays just spams audio at full volume.  Software could easily detect and ban these but for some reason it doesn't happen.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is an amazing game in my opinion. There have been some ups and downs with the game in the past, and sometimes the hitboxes are really stupid, but overall, with the design of the game, to the style, it's definitely worth something to check out.
